Symbiora - LLM QUICK REFERENCE

STACK: Turborepo + Bun 1.3 | Next.js 15-16 | React 19 | TypeScript 5.7
       Biome (lint/format) | shadcn/ui + Radix | Tailwind v4
       Apollo Client (GraphQL) | Supabase Auth | Fumadocs

APPS:
  apps/www:3000   - Marketing site (public)
  apps/app:3001   - Dashboard SaaS (auth required)
  apps/legal:3002 - Legal docs (public)
  apps/docs:3003  - Product docs (public)
  apps/story:6006 - Storybook (dev only)

PACKAGES:
  @repo/ui                 - All shared UI components (shadcn)
  @repo/tokens             - Design tokens
  @repo/typescript-config  - Shared TS configs

COMMANDS:
  bun dev                              Start all apps
  bun --filter @repo/X dev             Start single app
  bunx shadcn@latest add Y -c packages/ui   Add component
  bun run lint                         Lint all (Biome)
  bun run format                       Format all (Biome)
  bun turbo check-types                TypeScript check
  bun doctor                           Validate environment

CRITICAL RULES:
  1. UI Components -> packages/ui (NEVER add to apps directly)
  2. GraphQL changes -> Update ALL THREE: typeDefs + resolvers + mock data
  3. Forms -> react-hook-form + zod
  4. Style -> Biome only (no ESLint/Prettier), no semicolons, double quotes

KEY FILES:
  apps/app/src/data/schema/typeDefs.ts  - GraphQL schema
  apps/app/src/data/resolvers/          - GraphQL resolvers
  apps/app/src/data/mock/               - Mock data
  apps/app/src/lib/auth.ts              - Auth config
  apps/app/src/middleware.ts            - Route protection
  packages/ui/src/components/           - All shared UI
  packages/ui/components.json           - shadcn config

DECISION TREE - Where does code go?

  Is it a UI component?
    -> Shared across apps? -> packages/ui
    -> App-specific layout/form? -> apps/<app>/src/components/

  Is it data/API related?
    -> GraphQL type? -> apps/app/src/data/schema/typeDefs.ts
    -> Resolver? -> apps/app/src/data/resolvers/
    -> Mock data? -> apps/app/src/data/mock/

  Is it a utility function?
    -> UI-related (cn, etc)? -> packages/ui/src/lib/
    -> App-specific? -> apps/<app>/src/lib/

  Is it documentation?
    -> Product docs? -> apps/docs/content/docs/
    -> Legal docs? -> apps/legal/content/docs/

NAMING CONVENTIONS:
  Components: PascalCase (UserProfile.tsx)
  Utilities: camelCase (formatDate.ts)
  Pages: lowercase-hyphen (user-settings/page.tsx)
  Types: PascalCase, .types.ts suffix when separate

IMPORTS:
  import { Button } from "@repo/ui/components/button"
  import { cn } from "@repo/ui/lib/utils"

READ ORDER FOR FULL CONTEXT:
  1. LLMS.txt (this file)
  2. CLAUDE.md (detailed guidance)
  3. packages/ui/components.json (component registry)
  4. apps/app/src/data/schema/typeDefs.ts (data model)
